title: A poem on St. Thomas Mount
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   A poem has been created or is being highlighted in the news.
*   The subject matter of this poem is St. Thomas Mount.
*   The poem likely explores the cultural, historical, or geographical significance of this specific location.

title: Draft DAP aims to align defence acquisition with rapidly evolving geo-strategic landscape: Government
content:
The government is drafting a new Defence Acquisition Procedure (DAP).
*   Its primary aim is to align the process of acquiring defence equipment.
*   This alignment is in response to the rapidly evolving global strategic landscape.

title: Chambal aqueduct set to facilitate water supply from river link project in Rajasthan
content:
The Chambal aqueduct is being prepared to facilitate water supply.
*   This water will be sourced from a river link project.
*   The initiative aims to improve water distribution in Rajasthan.

title: CM Naidu seeks Central support for irrigation and infrastructure projects in A.P.
content:
Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister (CM) Naidu is seeking assistance.
*   The request is directed towards the Central government.
*   The support is needed for irrigation and infrastructure projects in A.P.

title: Villagers in Odisha boycott anganwadi over appointment of Dalit employee
content:
Villagers in Odisha are boycotting an anganwadi center.
*   The boycott is in protest of the appointment of a Dalit employee.
*   This action highlights ongoing issues of caste-based discrimination.

title: Wajid Ali Shah was not exiled to Calcutta, he came on his own, says book by descendant
content:
A new book claims that Wajid Ali Shah was not exiled to Calcutta.
*   Instead, the book asserts that he traveled there voluntarily.
*   The author of this book is a direct descendant of Wajid Ali Shah.

title: A tug of war over claiming credit
content:
Here are three bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   There is a dispute or competition among different parties.
*   The conflict centers on who should receive acknowledgement or praise for an achievement.
*   Various groups are vying to take ownership of a successful outcome or action.

title: Vidhana Soudha group D employee arrested for stealing visitor’s bag with gold, cash from Minister’s office
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   A Vidhana Soudha Group D employee has been arrested.
*   The arrest is for allegedly stealing a visitor's bag containing gold and cash.
*   The theft reportedly occurred inside a Minister's office within the Vidhana Soudha.

title: T.N. likely to become $150 billion electronics hub by 2030, says State Industries Minister T.R.B. Rajaa
content:
Tamil Nadu is projected to become a $150 billion electronics hub.
*   This development is anticipated to be achieved by the year 2030.
*   The forecast was made by State Industries Minister T.R.B. Rajaa.

title: Kerala launches ‘Rakshakavacham’ accident insurance scheme for private sector workers
content:
Kerala has launched a new insurance scheme.
*   The scheme is named ‘Rakshakavacham’ and specifically covers accidents.
*   It is designed to benefit workers in the private sector.
